p: Besides NS1, NP and PA-X contribute to block the SG assembly [ 111, 112]. In fact, IAV NP was shown to be crucial for the P58 IPK activation and subsequent inhibition of PKR-mediated host response during IAV infection by exploiting Hsp40 [ 68]. Remarkably, the formation of SGs in virus-infected cells inversely correlates with accumulation of viral gene products, indicating that SG formation might be an important part of the cellular antiviral response.
